pkgmetadata.longdescription: An R Interface to the 'ROPTLIB' Library for Riemannian Manifold Optimization // An R interface to version 0.3 of the 'ROPTLIB' optimization library (see https://www.math.fsu.edu/~whuang2/ for more information). Optimize real- valued functions over manifolds such as Stiefel, Grassmann, and Symmetric Positive Definite matrices. For details see Martin et. al. (2020) doi:10.18637/jss.v093.i01. Note that the optional ldr package used in some of this package's examples can be obtained from either JSS https://www.jstatsoft.org/index.php/jss/article/view /v061i03/2886 or from the CRAN archives https://cran.r-project. org/src/contrib/Archive/ldr/ldr_1.3.3.tar.gz.
